column4: HELP: I just tryied accesing my smart media card using a card reader, it work fine at first, then screwed up...my camera wont see it anymore.Ive tried reformating it: vfat, but it's lost space and the cam still gives me an error when I insert it!
did you probeply unmount the drive before "plugging out" ?
yes, I ejected it.. I tried roformating with the disk tool, as I was have permision problems...now the cam wont see it
please reformat it with your camera and on mounting use "auto"
